sent.orig: The bio-leaching system involves polyphase interfacial interactions, such as microorganism-mineral, mineral-mineral, microorganism-solution, mineral-gas phase.
sent.trans: 摘要微生物浸出体系涉及微生物－矿物、矿物－矿物、微生物－溶液－矿物－气相等多相界面作用。

sent.orig: Our product include gypsum board, mineral fIber ceiling, gypsum board and mineral fiber ceiling production line.
sent.trans: 我们的主要产品包括石膏板，矿棉板，石膏板和矿棉板的生产线等。

sent.orig: Therefore, tax adjustment of mineral products will not necessarily increase the prices of mineral products.
sent.trans: 因此调整矿产品增值税不一定会令矿产品价格提高。

sent.orig: Class B: liquid mineral exploration; mineral exploration infrastructure (drilling) .
sent.trans: 乙级：液体矿产勘查；勘查工程施工（钻）。

sent.orig: Chemical components, mineral composition and mineral dissemination characteristics of Yuanjiacun quartz-type oxide ore were studied.
sent.trans: 分析了太钢袁家村铁矿石英型氧化矿石的化学成分、矿物组成、粒度嵌布特征。
